column58: [Illustration] [Illustration: Wet Feet] _WET FEET_   Down the street together,   In the rainy weather,     Went a pair of little boys along;   One of them went straying   In the gutters playing,     Doing all his mother said was wrong;   One of them went dashing   Into puddles splashing,     Under dripping eaves that soaked him through;   One of them avoided   All the other boy did,     Dodging all the slimy, slushy goo.
